item.title: Autotalker
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

I think he wants to make it simpler and better…Here look at this script:

[code]/////// // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// // // Script_Owned4’s //
/////// /////// // //////// // // // RS Auto-Talker //
// // // // // // // // // Script. //
/////// // // // // // // // // INSTRUTIONS: //
// //////// /////// //1.Fill in what you want to say under the const. //
///// // //2.Move the “crosshairs” to the window you would like it to run on.//
// //3.Run the script. //
/////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program autotalker;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
WhatYourGonnaSay = ‘Cyan:Wave:FOLLOW ME TO WIN 100K!’;
TalkingMode = ‘f1’;//You can change to human,or spam,F1 means you press F1 for it to type

procedure talk;
begin
if(TalkingMode = ‘Spam’)or(TalkingMode = ‘spam’)then
Wait(100);
Sendkeys(WhatYourGonnaSay);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’, false);
if(TalkingMode=‘Human’)or(TalkingMode=‘human’)then
Wait(100);
TypeSend(WhatYourGonnaSay);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’, false);
if(TalkingMode=‘F1’)or(TalkingMode=‘f1’)then
Wait(100);
if(IsFKeyDown(1))then
Wait(100);
SendKeys(WhatYourGonnaSay);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’, false);
end;

procedure autotalk;
begin
talk;
end;

procedure f1autotalk;
begin
if(TalkingMode=‘f1’)or(TalkingMode=‘F1’)then
if(IsFKeyDown(1))then
talk;
end;

begin
repeat
autotalk;
Wait(100);
if(TalkingMode=‘f1’)or(TalkingMode=‘F1’)then
f1autotalk;
until(IsFKeyDown(2));//press the F2 button for it to stop
Writeln(‘You have used script_owned4s auto talker’);
Writeln(‘Hope you have enjoyed this script!’);
end.[/code]

Read full topic
